rithask/cts-virtual-caregiver-backend.summary: Recent activities in the cts-virtual-caregiver-backend repository have primarily focused on enhancing backend functionality with features including integration of medicine endpoints and 'find full medicines'. Moreover, endpoints for profile, summarize reports, and profile have been included. Efforts have also been directed towards refining code with changes such as expiring JWT token time, modifying endpoint responses, and adding models to manage PDF uploads for records.

rithask/metube.summary: Recent activities on the metube repository involved adding new features such as the 'Best (iOS) option to iCloud shortcut' and integrating support for yt-dlp. Various bug fixes and pull requests for issues ranging from file deletion, calculating download dir correctly when deleting files, to correcting retry button issues were successfully merged. Additional enhancements including updating dependencies and improving README examples were also included.

profile_summary:
Rithas M K is a highly skilled and accomplished developer with a strong foundation in programming languages, including C, Python, and JavaScript. With a proven track record of creating high-quality code and actively contributing to the development community, Rithas has established a reputation as a reliable and innovative problem-solver. As a dedicated professional with a strong online presence, Rithas has attracted a network of 39 followers and maintains an impressive portfolio of 34 public repositories, showcasing a commitment to transparency and collaboration.

As a seasoned developer, Rithas leverages expertise in multiple programming languages to deliver efficient, scalable, and well-documented solutions that meet the evolving needs of the industry. With a deep understanding of software development principles and a passion for staying up-to-date with the latest technologies, Rithas consistently delivers high-quality work that exceeds expectations. By combining technical expertise with a collaborative approach, Rithas is a valuable asset to any development team seeking innovative solutions and exceptional results.
